content: For the year ended December 31, 2022, we reported a net loss of approximately $37.7 million or $0.17 net loss per share, compared to a net loss of approximately $78.8 million or $0.37 net loss per share for the year ended December 31, 2021, an impressive year-over-year reduction of 52%. Our operating cash burn for the year ended December 31, 2022 was approximately $29.2 million compared to approximately $61.5 million for the year ended December 31, 2021, a decrease of approximately $32.2 million or 52%, reflecting the full year impact of our cost reduction efforts and our focus on being good stewards of capital.
